actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide that a family's net income (as determined for Federal income tax purposes), rather than its gross income, shall be used in determining the eligibility of its members for services with respect to which Federal payments may be made thereunder.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to provide that a family's taxable income, rather than its gross income, shall be used in determining the eligibility of its members for benefits under such Title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide that a family's net income (as determined for Federal income tax purposes), rather than its gross income, shall be used in determining the eligibility of its members for services with respect to which Federal payments may be made thereunder.
